title: New York State Senate passes prohibitions on non-competes
dot:
digraph NonCompeteLegislation{node[shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightblue]; SenateApproval[label="New York State Senate Approves Bills", shape=ellipse, fillcolor=lightgreen];BillS3100A[label="Bill S3100A
- Ban on all non-compete agreements
- Applies to all workers
- $10,000 damages for violations"];BillS6748[label="Bill S6748
- Limited ban on certain non-compete agreements
- Requires 'good faith basis' for enforceability"];NextSteps[label="Next Steps
- Must pass State Assembly
- Requires Governor's approval"]; SenateApproval->BillS3100A;SenateApproval->BillS6748;BillS3100A->NextSteps;BillS6748->NextSteps;subgraph cluster_1{label="Legislation Overview";style=dashed;BillS3100A;BillS6748;} subgraph cluster_2{label="Outcomes";style=dotted;NextSteps;}}
